prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Piano, Bass, Strings, Reed, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Guitar, Drums, Piano, Bass, Strings, Reed, but not Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Piano, Bass, Strings, Reed, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Guitar, Drums, Piano, Bass, Strings, Reed, omitting Pipe.
